article_text: On Monday, 93% of readers said "No" to the question, " Are there sufficient in-patient psychiatric services? How much of an Affordable Care Act nerd are you? Test your knowledge of healthcare policy with the following quiz:The Affordable Care Act -- or "Obamacare" as it is often called -- has been the subject of much debate ever since it was passed back in 2010. But how much do you know about the law's history -- and some of the latest controversies? Test your knowledge with this quiz!
